name: MiniGravity
description:
A game made for the Blackthornprod Game jam #2, theme: MiniPlanets

Made within a 5 day span, by uno dev,

Go around in your spaceship and collect 50 "Materials" to win, but avoid astroids, for they break your ship down. You are not unprepared though, you carry around with you a powerful magnet. Left click to pull everything, even planets, towards you, and right click to push everything away (materials don't get pushed away as much as others)

(Planets are safe to touch)
